item.description:
Sierra Club Annual Holiday Party
Tuesday, December 16, 4-7pm
Chapter Office, 10 Milk Street #632, Boston

All Sierra Club members and their guests are welcome! This will be a great opportunity to meet some of the Chapter leaders and activists. We'll supply snacks and beverages including warm apple cider. Plus we will have lots of literature about the projects we will be working on for 2009 and ways you can get more involved. The Sierra Club office is fully accessible, located near the MBTA's Park, Downtown Crossing and State Street stations. Come anytime between 4 and 7pm. Free.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Annual Holiday Party Meetup!
